name: FireplaceSoundforDeepSleep
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: If you want to sleep well then this skill brings you calm,soothing fireplace sound that will help you sleep well. Just ask alexa what is flash briefing and then you get to hear this fireplace sound. Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
